comments:
During the Europa build, when I run the siteOptimizer over all the Europa features and plug-ins, I get two FileNotFoundExceptions for two separate org.apache.* jars. I don't see anything immediately wrong with the jars and this bug does not seem to be covered by other siteOptimizer bugs.

The stack dump is:
Buildfile: build.xml

createPack200s:
     [java] Running Pack on org.apache.commons.net_1.4.1.v20061222.jar
     [java]   Processing nested file: lib/commons-net-1.4.1.jar
     [java] java.io.FileNotFoundException: output.d/temp.org.apache.commons.net_1.4.1.v20061222.jar/lib/commons-net-1.4.1.jar.pack.gz (No such file or directory)

I'm running with Eclipse 3.3M4 linux-gtk-ppc on the build.eclipse.org machine (a PPC machine) using the ibm-java2-ppc-50 JVM. The siteOptimizer works (packs or skips) all the other jars except these two (see attachments).
Created an attachment (id=58924)
build.xml used to use the siteOptimizer

Created an attachment (id=58925)
one of the two jars that crashes the site optimizer

Created an attachment (id=58926)
the other of the two jars that crash the site optimizer

Bjorn, try replacing the update core jar from this bug in your M4 install.

https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=149970

You may be encountering the same error we had in our build where pack200 doesn't fail gracefully.

See also this bug for further info

https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=172935

Thank you, that fixed the problem.
closing
